title: Mirror of the heart: Poems of Sara Teasdale
description: "Poetry readers have always acknowledged Sara Teasdale's talent as a lyric poet. Now. in celebration of the centennial of her birth, Teasdale's literary executor has authorized the release of 51 poems that the poet had deemed 'too personal' for publication even after her death. These poems will liberate Teasdale from her reputation as a sentimental poet and place her firmly within the poetic tradition of the twentieth century."
author: Sara; Drake Teasdale
